name: AVIS.
description:
"A warlock attempts to seal away a powerful and stubborn demon. She wishes to try her hand at a seemingly impossible task, but only time will tell if she will be the one who finally succeeds."

A short game made as a submission for the O2A2 VN Jam 2023 (Only One of Any Asset).

This game is set in the universe of a future game (which will be linked on this page once completed), but can be played as a standalone experience. This is arguably a joke prologue to said future game, and so not something I consider truly canon to the story.

The demon uses They/Them pronouns, the warlock uses She/Her pronouns.

FEATURES:

  • 1 sprite
  • 1 background
  • 1 illustration
  • 1 song
  • 1 sound effect
  • 1k words

(Important Warning: There is a written description of blood and gore, as well as illustrated blood and eye trauma. These are present in the two choices present at the end of the game.)
